Usage
  • Once you enter the website and select your OS, you'll download a zip file which contains the Electron app directory.
  • It is up to you where you wish to move this directory to.
  • On Linux based systems, you have the option to create a desktop entry for the application. Look at this Arch Wiki entry. You should be able create desktop entries to launch the app from your application launcher with this method.
  • The usage varies widely on macOS and Windows.
